svg.text: GCP Cost Monitoring Agent — Technical Summary
✓ Use GCP Built-in Tools | ✓ Stateless Server | ✓ Event-Driven | ✓ On-Demand Queries | ✓ Minimal Infrastructure
No custom databases • No polling • All state in GCP services
What We Build vs What GCP Provides
WE DO NOTHING — GCP collects and stores automatically
TRIGGERED BY GCP — We only react to events
NO POLLING — Queries only when user asks
What We Store vs What GCP Stores:
Billing → BigQuery | Budget monitoring | Recommender | Asset tracking
We do nothing — GCP handles it
Budget threshold → Circuit Breaker | Resource created → Cost Alert
User question → MCP Server → Query GCP APIs → Response
No polling — queries only when user asks
GCP Cost Monitoring Agent — Technical Summary v1.1 — February 2025
